title: I Cant launch my legacy client! I Have tried everything! Someone please help me!

replies.body:
After clicking on launch legacy client.   try going into the file location of the game you will see three league applications.   It should be the bottom one.  Double click that and it should load.


Note this has to be done after clicking launch legacy client or it will just load the beta client.
So I open the beta client, and I click launch legacy client, then after that I open the file location and I click The lol.launcher? or what file do I click?
Sorry to hear that.  Unfortunately I am out of ideas then.

i had a problem similar where i couldnt open the game but my kernal was failing im not quite sure, whats going on with you, kinda lose you at the launchpad (dont know wtf that is) but running mine in administrator made it run just fine i guess you could try that?

Sometimes certain administrator settings or software can block the patcher from launching. Based on the steps you've taken to troubleshoot the issue, I'm thinking this may be caused by certain security settings. Let's try adjusting some of your [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to be sure that your patcher has proper access to use the game files.

Let me know if helps or if you have any other questions!
So what are you trying to say I have to do, What files do I have to go into?

Sorry about that confusion! We've got a handy little permissions troubleshooting guide which may be able to narrow down what's causing the problem. You can find the guide here: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions

Hope that helps out more!
23 Views, but no one has the time to help me :(
